localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: ProStyles is an AI camera app that edits your photos & videos in the style of pro photographers as you shoot them. The built-in Style Store features AI style models created by some of the best photographers out there.
blogPost.body: ProStyles is an AI camera app that edits your photos & videos in the style of pro photographers as you shoot them. The built-in Style Store features AI style models created by some of the best photographers out there.
blogPost.title: ProStyle Camera by NeuralCam - AI Cam App - Photos auto-edited in the style of pros
blogPost.author: Bram Kanstein (@bramk)

localize.description: ProStyles是一款人工智能相机应用程序，在你拍摄照片和视频时，它会以专业摄影师的风格编辑它们。内置风格商店的特色是由一些最好的摄影师创建的人工智能风格模型。
localize.tagline: AI Cam App-照片以专业风格自动编辑

localize.description: ProStyles是一款人工智能相機應用程序，在你拍攝照片和視頻時，它會以專業攝影師的風格編輯它們。內置風格商店的特色是由一些最好的攝影師創建的人工智能風格模型。
localize.tagline: AI Cam App-照片以專業風格自動編輯

next.title:
Netflix is already in talks to make a movie about the events over the past week. 

So is Amazon. So is HBO. So is CBS. So is Hulu. So is USA. And AMC networks. And Disney. And Turner. And CSPAN.

localize.full_text:
Netflix已经在商讨拍摄一部关于过去一周事件的电影。

亚马逊也是。HBO也是。CBS也是 Hulu也是 美国电视台也是 和AMC网络。和迪斯尼。和特纳。和CSPAN。

Netflix已經在商討拍攝一部關於過去一週事件的電影。

亞馬遜也是。HBO也是。CBS也是 Hulu也是 美國電視臺也是 和AMC網絡。和迪斯尼。和特納。和CSPAN。
